title: λ:/thoughts-memo-translation-main/rice/learning/If you want to succeed in the video games industry
text:
# 如果你想要在电子游戏这个行业中取得成功

原文：[If you want to succeed in the video games industry](https://wiki.issarice.com/wiki/If_you_want_to_succeed_in_the_video_games_industry)

 **如果你想在电子游戏这个行业中取得成功……** ，这是 [Jonathan Blow] 经常挂在嘴边的流行语。说完这句话之后，他往往会说些很搞笑或者非常具体的东西。
caption: 如果你想要在电子游戏这个行业中取得成功
original-title: If you want to succeed in the video games industry
